value.title: How to execute Azure Machine Learning service pipelines in Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can run your Azure Machine Learning (AML) service pipelines as a step in your Azure Data Factory (ADF) pipelines.
